description: Numbers n such that all digits have same parity.
comments: Union of A014261 and A014263;A059717(a(n)) = a(n). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2011]A059707(a(n)) = a(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 15 2012
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 140], (cnt = Count[id = IntegerDigits[#], _?OddQ]; cnt == 0 || cnt == Length[id]) & ] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 16 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a059708 n = a059708_list !! (n-1)a059708_list = filter sameParity [0..] where   sameParity n = all (`elem` "02468") ns               || all (`elem` "13579") ns where ns = show n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 07 2001
